thread.title: The best Chandler Bing one-liner in 'Friends' history
thread.title_full: The best Chandler Bing one-liner in 'Friends' history

author: Kayla Bazile
title: The best Chandler Bing one-liner in 'Friends' history
text:
It's hard to pinpoint one great moment out of the 10 years Friends graced our television screens because are too many too chose from. Not only did we get iconic scenes from the show but there were countless lines that have stood the test of time. I mean, how many times have you said "how you doin'?" 
SEE ALSO: Cole Sprouse had a really difficult time working with Jennifer Aniston on 'Friends' 
Well, Matthew Perry narrowed down his favorite one-liner of all time while appearing on Good Morning America . It comes from Season 2, episode 1, “The One with Ross’ New Girlfriend” in which Chandler is talking to Joey (Matt LeBlanc) about his longtime tailor and tosses out a trademark Chandler sarcastic quip. 
WATCH: @MatthewPerry talks about 'FRIENDS' and his all-time favorite Chandler Bing one-liner! pic.twitter.com/lEPqAbj1JE 
— Good Morning America (@GMA) March 30, 2017 
Not only funny, but solid life advice.
WATCH: Student befriends squirrel, both become campus celebs
